svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
December 16, 2023" date: "2023-12-16"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
* Latest all core devs ‚Äì consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
Devnet-12 : Prysm joined, MEV-Boost being tested Goerli shadow fork 1 : syncing
started Discussions on SSE block event for block propagation times, slashable message
propagation and GossipSub IDONTWANT control message
Latest all core devs ‚Äì consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
* Devnet-12 : Prysm joined, MEV-Boost being tested
Devnet-12 : Prysm joined, MEV-Boost being tested
* Goerli shadow fork 1 : syncing started
Goerli shadow fork 1 : syncing started
* Discussions on SSE block event for block propagation times, slashable message
Discussions on SSE block event for block propagation times, slashable message
* Dencun interop testing call video
Dencun interop testing call video
* Tim Beiko‚Äôs core devs update : Dencun upgrade EIPs, EIP process changes and
Prague/Electra planning
Tim Beiko‚Äôs core devs update : Dencun upgrade EIPs, EIP process changes and
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* üö® Lido at 31.98% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
üö® Lido at 31.98% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~84%
supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm 41% &
Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
* Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean
loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Layer 1
* Yoav: ERC4337 (account abstraction) vs EIP3074 (execution abstraction)
Yoav: ERC4337 (account abstraction) vs EIP3074 (execution abstraction)
* Vitalik: enshrined zkEVMs at Layer 1 , tradeoffs and design challenges
Vitalik: enshrined zkEVMs at Layer 1 , tradeoffs and design challenges
* Ethernets.io (node crawler): ~17k nodes found, 60% not accepting connections
Ethernets.io (node crawler): ~17k nodes found, 60% not accepting connections
* Monitoreth.io (consensus layer dashboard) updated with ISP & staking entities
distribution
Monitoreth.io (consensus layer dashboard) updated with ISP & staking entities
For Stakers
* EthStaker: DVT home staker program , pilot reimbursing hardware costs of new stakers
Client releases
* Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.12.1 : patch for v1.12 block root errors ( post-mortem
) Teku v23.12.0 : adds checkpoint-sync-url option and performance improvements
Consensus layer:
* Lodestar v1.12.1 : patch for v1.12 block root errors ( post-mortem )
Lodestar v1.12.1 : patch for v1.12 block root errors ( post-mortem )
* Teku v23.12.0 : adds checkpoint-sync-url option and performance improvements
Teku v23.12.0 : adds checkpoint-sync-url option and performance improvements
* Execution layer Nethermind v1.24.0 : not downgradable, improvements to headers
database
Execution layer
* Nethermind v1.24.0 : not downgradable, improvements to headers database
Research
* Timing games: cost of artificial latency in PBS
Layer 2
* Arbitrum One sequencer & feed stalled during surge in traffic 90% of transactions
were inscriptions
Arbitrum One sequencer & feed stalled during surge in traffic
* 90% of transactions
* RollCall (L2 standards) call video : discussed RIP7212 (secp256r1 precompile),
RIP7560 (native account abstraction) and EIP3074 (AUTH & AUTHCALL)
RollCall (L2 standards) call video : discussed RIP7212 (secp256r1 precompile), RIP7560
(native account abstraction) and EIP3074 (AUTH & AUTHCALL)
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs: Meta EIP7577 : Versioning scheme for EIPs
EIPs:
* Meta EIP7577 : Versioning scheme for EIPs
* RIPs (Rollup Improvement Proposals): RIP7212 : Precompile for secp256r1 Curve
Support (moved from EIPs)
RIPs (Rollup Improvement Proposals):
* RIP7212 : Precompile for secp256r1 Curve Support (moved from EIPs)
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7573 : Conditional-upon-Transfer-Decryption for
Delivery-versus-Payment ERC7574 : Authentication SBT using credential ERC7575 :
Partial and extended ERC4626 vaults ERC7578 : Physical asset redemption ERC7579 :
Minimal modular smart accounts ERC7580 : Inter dapp tracking interface
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7573 : Conditional-upon-Transfer-Decryption for Delivery-versus-Payment
ERC7573 : Conditional-upon-Transfer-Decryption for Delivery-versus-Payment
* ERC7574 : Authentication SBT using credential
ERC7574 : Authentication SBT using credential
* ERC7575 : Partial and extended ERC4626 vaults
ERC7575 : Partial and extended ERC4626 vaults
* ERC7578 : Physical asset redemption
ERC7578 : Physical asset redemption
* ERC7579 : Minimal modular smart accounts
ERC7579 : Minimal modular smart accounts
* ERC7580 : Inter dapp tracking interface
ERC7580 : Inter dapp tracking interface
Stuff for developers
* Foundry: Forge-std v1.7.4 : adds Balance, Extcodesize, Extcodehash, Extcodecopy as
account access kinds and new cheat codes to delete snapshots Polygon deployment &
upgrade libraries (JavaScript), Forge Chronicles (creates JSON & markdown deployment
log), Storage Delta (compares storage layouts) & Deployer Kit (generate deployer
contracts for upgradeable contracts), beta
Foundry:
* Forge-std v1.7.4 : adds Balance, Extcodesize, Extcodehash, Extcodecopy as account
access kinds and new cheat codes to delete snapshots
Forge-std v1.7.4 : adds Balance, Extcodesize, Extcodehash, Extcodecopy as account
* Polygon deployment & upgrade libraries (JavaScript), Forge Chronicles (creates JSON
& markdown deployment log), Storage Delta (compares storage layouts) & Deployer Kit
(generate deployer contracts for upgradeable contracts), beta
Polygon deployment & upgrade libraries (JavaScript), Forge Chronicles (creates JSON &
markdown deployment log), Storage Delta (compares storage layouts) & Deployer Kit
* Create an AMM in Vyper using Ape (Python contract dev framework)
Create an AMM in Vyper using Ape (Python contract dev framework)
* Code MASTER : create AST mutators
Code MASTER : create AST mutators
* EVMole v0.2.0 (function selector extractor): adds extracting function arguments
EVMole v0.2.0 (function selector extractor): adds extracting function arguments
* Ponder (dapp backend framework): index events, generate GraphQL API, local dev
server with hot reloading, implemented in TypeScript
Ponder (dapp backend framework): index events, generate GraphQL API, local dev server
with hot reloading, implemented in TypeScript
* FUZD : commit/reveal system, executes delayed transactions decrypted at execution
time, alpha
FUZD : commit/reveal system, executes delayed transactions decrypted at execution
* OpenZeppelin Defender v2 , public beta, new modules: Code (analysis of PRs), Audit
(track issues & resolutions), Deploy, Monitor, Incident Response, Actions¬† & Access
Control
OpenZeppelin Defender v2 , public beta, new modules: Code (analysis of PRs), Audit
Security
* Ledger Connect Kit library supply chain attack , drainer injected into dapps
Ledger Connect Kit library supply chain attack , drainer injected into dapps
* OKX DEX $370k exploit , deprecated contract compromised
OKX DEX $370k exploit , deprecated contract compromised
* Hypr bridge exploit , contract reinitialized, built on fork of OP Stack develop
branch
Hypr bridge exploit , contract reinitialized, built on fork of OP Stack develop branch
* Cyfrin Updraft security & auditing course (22 hours)
Cyfrin Updraft security & auditing course (22 hours)
Ecosystem
* ETH supply below Vitalik‚Äôs proposed EIP960 ETH supply cap
ETH supply below Vitalik‚Äôs proposed EIP960 ETH supply cap
* ETHIndia hackathon finalists
ETHIndia hackathon finalists
Onchain stats
* Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 16.9 to 346.6 gwei, with 41.7 gwei average Zero
net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei 15k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 16.9 to 346.6 gwei, with 41.7 gwei average
* Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei
* 15k ETH net burn this week
15k ETH net burn this week
* ETHUSD : $2,161 - $2,385, currently $2,223
ETHUSD : $2,161 - $2,385, currently $2,223
* ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
* ENS root being transferred to the ENS DAO
ENS root being transferred to the ENS DAO
* Coinbase wallet buy/send USDC for free on Layer 2
Coinbase wallet buy/send USDC for free on Layer 2
* Synthetix ends SNX inflation
Synthetix ends SNX inflation
Job Listings
* Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
* ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* SEC denied Coinbase‚Äôs petition for crypto rules; SEC Republican members disagree
SEC denied Coinbase‚Äôs petition for crypto rules; SEC Republican members disagree
* Tether freezing wallets on OFACs list
Tether freezing wallets on OFACs list
* KuCoin settlement with New York: cease operations in the state, refund users & $5.3M
penalty
KuCoin settlement with New York: cease operations in the state, refund users & $5.3M
* Four people charged for laundering proceeds from ‚Äúpig butchering‚Äù crypto investment
scams
Four people charged for laundering proceeds from ‚Äúpig butchering‚Äù crypto investment
* Coinbase International Exchange spot ETH-USDC for non-US institutional clients
Coinbase International Exchange spot ETH-USDC for non-US institutional clients
General
* S&P Global Ratings stablecoin stability assessment
S&P Global Ratings stablecoin stability assessment
* BIS tighten stablecoin criteria in 2022 proposal that banks can hold up to 2% in
crypto
BIS tighten stablecoin criteria in 2022 proposal that banks can hold up to 2% in
* Twitter XSS vulnerability : attackers could have taken over accounts
Twitter XSS vulnerability : attackers could have taken over accounts
* Arecibo : implementation of SuperNova
Arecibo : implementation of SuperNova
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week‚Äôs news in real time.
Permalink for this week‚Äôs issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-december-16-2023
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Jan 15 ‚Äì EF‚Äôs Next Billion fellowship cohort 4 deadline
Jan 15 ‚Äì EF‚Äôs Next Billion fellowship cohort 4 deadline
* Feb 2-4 ‚Äì ETH Cinco de Mayo hackathon (Cholula, Puebla)
Feb 2-4 ‚Äì ETH Cinco de Mayo hackathon (Cholula, Puebla)
* Feb 3 ‚Äì Ethereum Lima Day
Feb 3 ‚Äì Ethereum Lima Day
* Feb 23-Mar 3 ‚Äì ETHDenver BUIDLWeek & hackathon
Feb 23-Mar 3 ‚Äì ETHDenver BUIDLWeek & hackathon
* Mar 13-14 ‚Äì ETHLatam (San Pedro Sula, Honduras)
Mar 13-14 ‚Äì ETHLatam (San Pedro Sula, Honduras)
* Mar 15-17 ‚Äì ETHGlobal London
Mar 15-17 ‚Äì ETHGlobal London

Mar 27-30 ‚Äì ETH Bucharest hackathon & conference

Mar 29-31 ‚Äì ETH Seoul

Apr 5-26 ‚Äì ETHGlobal Scaling Ethereum (virtual)

Apr 5-7 ‚Äì EthereumZuri.ch conference & hackathon
* May 3-5 ‚Äì ETHGlobal Sydney
May 3-5 ‚Äì ETHGlobal Sydney
* May 21-23 ‚Äì DappCon (Berlin)
May 21-23 ‚Äì DappCon (Berlin)
* May 24-26 ‚Äì ETHBerlin
May 24-26 ‚Äì ETHBerlin
* May 31-Jun 2 ‚Äì ETHPrague conference & hackathon
May 31-Jun 2 ‚Äì ETHPrague conference & hackathon
* Jul 8-11 ‚Äì EthCC (Brussels)
Jul 8-11 ‚Äì EthCC (Brussels)
* Jul 12-14 ‚Äì ETHGlobal Brussels
Jul 12-14 ‚Äì ETHGlobal Brussels
* Aug 23-Sep 13 ‚Äì ETHGlobal ETHOnline (virtual)
